text: The women's 100 metres hurdles event at the 2004 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Grosseto, Italy, at Stadio Olimpico Carlo Zecchini on 15 and 16 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Ronetta Alexander ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sabrina Altermatt ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Stephanie Lichtl ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 16 July Wind: -1.0m/s {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
